programme.title: Wipeout USA S8
programme.desc: Follows the three rounds and three-stage, obstacle course consisting of multiple strategy and decision points designed to further challenge, and wear out, the stamina of the competitors. Hosted by John Cena, Nicole Byer, and Camille Kostek.

programme.title: Celebrity Family Feud
programme.desc: The classic Family Feud format has entertained a generation, and this hilarious celebrity reboot sees Emmy-award winning talk show host Steve Harley at the helm, as your favourite celebrities and their families play the game, thinking on their feet and trying to second guess the general public.

programme.title: Beat The Chasers S3
programme.desc: Could you beat the greatest quiz team ever assembled? Bringing together all five of our favourite quiz geniuses, Beat the Chasers, hosted by Bradley Walsh, expands the award-winning The Chase brand for a primetime audience.

programme.title: Spy In The Wild S2
programme.desc: Witness nature's greatest dramas and emotional encounters up close as Spy in the Wild returns with its revolutionary spycameras. The series explores mass gatherings among the animal kingdom as its even more lifelike spy creatures infiltrate communities and take you into the heart of the action. Why do animals gather for one-off events? What does it feel like to be part of the herd? And how do they cope with the changing seasons and climate?

programme.title: Pokemon Master Journeys: The Series S24
programme.desc: It's a big, big world, but you know where to find Ash and Goh---battling and catching Pokemon from Kanto to Galar! With Pikachu, Cinderace, and their other Pokemon beside them, our heroes continue to travel all over the world to research Pokemon for Cerise Laboratory.

programme.desc: Follow the hectic and exciting adventures of Oscar the little penguin in unique environments! The young penguin is setting out to explore the world, meeting new characters who teach him about himself, but also about others. He quickly discovers that it's not the destination that matters, but rather the people you meet along the journey.

programme.title: Leo The Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Leo catches a raccoon digging around in his trash. The Junior Rangers take the raccoon back to the forest where it can find its own food. However, some unfriendly raccoons make things difficult for Leo and company... A yellow-eyed penguin wanders into Hero's kennel. The Junior Rangers head to New Zealand to find the penguin's home, but can they prevent tourists from disturbing yellow-eyed penguins on the beach?

programme.desc: (Dual Language - English and Mandarin) Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu are four young dinosaurs growing up in the Cretaceous period. programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! follows the adventures of high school student Yugi, who has a magical secret that comes to life when he plays his favorite card game.

programme.title: Mechamato 'The Animated Series' S2
programme.desc: (Dual Language - English and Malay) Mechamato is a Malaysian animated series produced by Animonsta Studios, focusing on a boy named Amato and his partner robot MechaBot, who fight against bad robots. The animated series aired on Cartoon Network Asia from 4 December 2021 to 26 February 2022. Mechamato is a part of the BoBoiBoy franchise and the series also takes place before the original series and BoBoiBoy Galaxy.

programme.title: DENVER The Last Dinosaur
programme.desc: Where most kids dream of having a dog, a cat, or even a hamster, Cliff has a dinosaur - Denver! Within adventures revolving around Cliff, Denver and a comedic crew of human friends, there's an inevitable monkey wrench that is always in play - Denver is a dino in a china shop! Moreover, being one-of- a-kind puts Denver on everyone's radar.

programme.title: Sky Shakers Series
programme.desc: SORA heads over to Uncle Ong's house, Nat, Uncle Ong and Andy trick her. The Spy-Bots are being sent out to find the Cratons. They manage to locate the children and observe them from a distant. The Henchmen prepare to capture the Cratons. Fox has been refusing food and very low on energy and throws up. Andy, Nat and Uncle Ong are worried. The children approaches the SORA Agent separately for help. She agrees. Uncle Ong helps Fox gets a blood transfusion from Spike.

programme.title: Talking Point
programme.desc: An increasing number of youths are turning to Life Coaches. But is it the quick fix to life's problems? Producer Charmaine Tan, herself a 20-something deep dives into the world of life coaching.

programme.title: Tanglin
programme.desc: Unaware about Diana's condition, Bee Li wants her to move back. Seeing Ismail and Salmah together, Khairul wonders if Ismail is truly falling for her. Meanwhile, Eddie and Shruti meet with their parents to discuss their reasons for marriage.

programme.title: Ainsley's Market Menu S1
programme.desc: Ainsley's journey takes him to the coastal haven of Wollongong, for the hustle and bustle of the Friday Foragers Market'. There's a big emphasis on organic food and before long a juicy organic watermelon catches Ainsley's eye which he matches with some pure, wild honey and coconut. Next up Ainsley spots some beautiful pink oyster mushrooms from local grower, Jessie, which he sautes with amaranth leaves, a local caprino romano cheese and serves on freshly baked sourdough.

programme.desc: The global phenomenon returns for a sixth season with iconic music legends Katy Perry, Luke Bryan and Lionel Richie bringing the glamour to the judging panel, and Emmy Award-winning host Ryan Seacrest. Follow the contestants journeys of triumphant highs and heartbreaking lows, once again, as the search for the next American music superstar continues to capture the world's attention.

programme.title: Lingo USA S1
programme.desc: In this game show, hosted by the iconic RuPaul, the simplest of words could be worth thousands of dollars. Lingo is the fast paced word-play game that keeps on innovating for new audiences, with its mix of skill, tension, humour and the chance to win big cash prizes. Teams are pitted against each other in a battle to fill in the blanks and find words.

programme.title: Sunny Side Up
programme.desc: Rose pushes Haresh into planning their honeymoon together but makes most of the decisions herself. Hafiq regrets helping Beth get on social media when he realises the dangers for a young child to go online.

programme.title: News Tonight
programme.desc: The daily evening-news programme featuring highlights and coverage of both local and international news with a local perspective.

programme.title: Inside Crime Scene S2
programme.desc: Investigators on the ground rely on forensic evidence and interrogations to construct a case - but what if the perpetuators outsmart the law by lying or resorting to fabricating the evidence when this can make a difference between life and death sentence, or a 13-year escape from prosecution. Will the truth of what really happened ever come to light?

programme.title: The Good Karma Hospital S4
programme.desc: 'The Good Karma Hospital' follows doctor Ruby Walker who swaps England for India and finds herself at an under-resourced and over-worked cottage hospital run by eccentric Englishwoman Lydia Fonseca (Amanda Redman).

programme.title: Spirit Of Sport S9
programme.desc: In this month's Spirit of Sport, relive one of the biggest nights in sport with highlights from the 2024 Laureus World Sports Awards at the iconic Palacio de Cibeles in Madrid. After scoring the winning goal in El Clasico, Jude Bellingham won the Laureus World Breakthrough of the Year. programme.title: 星期二特写 : 忆当年 一代歌星
programme.desc: 二十世纪初兴起的中文唱片业，随着电台广播、电视走入千家万户，开启了影视和流行音乐蓬勃发展的时代。新加坡人除了听港台歌星的歌曲之外，也在听潘秀琼、秦淮、黄清元、吴刚等生长于斯的歌手。他们对歌曲的演绎，吸引了万千知音，为年轻国家发挥了凝聚人心的作用，也成为建国一代人的集体回忆.

programme.title: 养生出大招
programme.desc: 养生出大招，健脑有绝招，这集邀请医师为长者平反，家里老是出现烧干的锅子、来不及收衣、摔破的杯等等，其实这些都跟脑退化有关！医师搬大招，赶快趁年轻学健脑，核桃、金针菜和天麻是健脑好食材，但是猪脑补脑竟然是养生陷阱，可能会影响男士生殖能力，快听医师怎么说！ 除了食疗健脑，手抓球也是健脑妙招！跟着镜头一起来到中医世家挖掘不老秘诀，简单两颗手抓球就能达到养生功效，原理到底是什么？ 师傅秀奇招，坐着也能练功健脑！翘起二郎腿，一手按摩小腿一手推压脚板，心情放松脑袋清醒，不知不觉就练完了健脑操！师傅再送一招，举起拇指比.

programme.title: 放下
programme.desc: 在家排行老大的姜志峰，有2弟2妹，父早逝，全靠母工作养家，他自小就无心向学，服完兵役后，开始在歌厅酒廊当歌星，从本地唱到荷兰，见惯江湖的险恶，也曾沾染大麻，为讨客人欢心，在酒廊唱歌时每晚都陪客喝酒，结果中了“酒毒“一不喝酒，就手抖个不停，母亲多次流泪劝阻亦不听，为了生计，他继续过着糜烂的生活，直到母患癌，为了替母祈福，及改变自己，才决定“放下”一切，到泰国的深山出家修行，但7年之后，他还俗了，而且还重出歌坛唱歌台，但他的人生目标已改变，现在他只希望能赚多点钱来帮助在山区的贫困孩童….
